billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

title: Provides for local community board input in the liquor authority's decision to license establishments serving alcohol for on-premise consumption
summary: Provides for enhanced municipal or, in New York city, community board input in the liquor authority's decision to license establishments serving alcohol for on-premises consumption; provides for increased notice and more meaningful opportunity to be heard.
currentCommittee: COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS
actClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to community board involvement in the licensing of establishments serving alcohol for on-premise consumption
